creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
It would be useful to have a TestBean GUI editor to handle enums whose display names need to be localised.

The value should be saved in the JMX as the ordinal of the chosen enum.

URL: http://svn.apache.org/r1514547
Log:
Need GUI Editor to process fields which are based on Enums with localised display strings
Better invocation strategy - pass in enum class and resource bundle
Bugzilla Id: 55421
